title: News digest [No. 2]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Crop-dusting aircraft help growers produce cotton near Robinvale; Dhurringile, a castle near Shepparton, is home to Scottish orphans who learn its history and help on the farm; the “Tambo Lady”, a 65-foot motor cruiser has a test run along the Latrobe River to Sale; young artists’ work displayed at the Museum of Modern Art.
